I keep reading comments of common people on various platforms of #Socialmedia. We asked our team to prepare an analytical report. The conclusion was that due to the weakening of #Prashant_Kishore, #Bihari is becoming more disappointed, who had to go out of #Bihar under some compulsion. But, they are waiting for the time when everything happens in #Bihar, then they return and can do everything in Bihar itself. Such people have had high hope from #Prashantkishor. 
And the other side of the report is also that due to every mistake of Prashant Kishore, people are most happy, for whom nothing else, only caste is Brahma, Vishnu, Mahesh. Prashant caste politics is not doing. Supporters of various political parties are even more cheerful, well they should also be, because they feel that #Jansuraaj is spoiling their own party.
